      • gamma

        public static double gamma(double alpha,
           double scale)
        Randomly sample 1 point from Gamma Distribution with the given parameters. The code is from Mahout (http://mahout.apache.org/), available under Apache 2 license.
        Parameters:
        alpha - alpha parameter for Gamma Distribution.
        scale - scale parameter for Gamma Distribution.
        Returns:
        a sample point randomly drawn from the given distribution.

                           throws LibrecException
        Randomly sample a matrix from Wishart Distribution with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        scale - scale parameter for Wishart Distribution.
        df - degree of freedom for Wishart Distribution.
        Returns:
        the sample randomly drawn from the given distribution.
        Throws:
        LibrecException - if error occurs
